identifier.title: Change Bridge Identifier
identifier.para-1: If you want to run multiple instances of HomeKitty in your network, for instance if you have two (or more) Homey's, each instance should have a unique bridge identifier.
identifier.para-2: After changing this setting, restart the HomeKitty app for the change to take effect.
identifier.para-3: Change this only if you have a reason to do so, otherwise you may lose your current HomeKit configuration.

reset.para-1: If you have problems trying to add Homey to HomeKit, for instance, if HomeKit can't find the HomeKitty bridge, you can perform a full reset. Make sure to restart the app afterwards!
